headline: PPA: Accelerated Defense Spending Will Provide Further Momentum
summary: PPA has surged since April, supported by rising global defense spending and strong positioning of its holdings in major geopolitical projects. See why PPA ETF is a buy.

headline: The Role of Lockheed Martin (LMT) in a Balanced Dividend Stock Portfolio
summary: Lockheed Martin Corporation (NYSE:LMT) is included among the Best Stocks for a Dividend Stock Portfolio. Lockheed Martin Corporation (NYSE:LMT) is an American defense and aerospace manufacturing company. It continues to channel significant resources into research and development, fueling innovation and strengthening its ability to deliver cutting-edge defense technologies that address shifting customer needs.
